summary:
Dogs eyes evil-orange, face covered in blood (mouth mostly).

Pluss dogs normals texture mod, to make blood more relistic.
descriptionHtml:
Hello.

PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE DOING ANYTHING!

This mod modifies default dog texture \"dog.dds\" (1024*1024) to a more evil and bloody variation 
(eyes evil-orange, face covered in blood).

How to install.

First extract the archive You downloaded, when if You don\'t have any other texture mods installed
simply place \"textures\" folder You extracted from archive to \"Data\" folder wich is located in
\"Skyrim\" folder, that should do it.
If You already have some texture mods installed (assuming none of them are dog textures) when place
\"dog\" folder (the one containing \"dog.dds\") in \"actors\" folder (\"actors\" folder should be in \"textures\" folder 
but if You don\'t have it just create it in \"Data\" folder wich is located in \"Skyrim\" folder), the point is that
in order for mod to work \"dog.dds\" must be placed under Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\dog    ,now it 
should work.

How to uninstall.

To uninstall delete \"dog.dds\" or dog folder with it.

The original dog textures wich i modified is made by Bethesda.

UPDATE.

Now I also uploaded a mod for dog normals texture (archive with \"dog_n.dds\") so the blood on dogs
face will look pretty much more realistic, at least it\'s my personal opinion.
See images \"dog new normals\" and \"dog old normals\" to compare (\"dog new normals\" is the image
that shows the result of normals mod I added recently).
It can be installed and uninstalled the same way as the main mod (of course installing it without
the main mod would be pointless).


Goodbye.
author: 6150RE
